String.string: Killian's Jesters are very cunning, so you must be careful.
Good job! I thank Kaia for sending you to us.
Eliminate Killian's Jesters in Tragieron Hall and Agonal Hall. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report to Amarvand at Furnace Approach.
